summary:
This spell allows the caster to do a BUTT ton more damage with a slight casting time boost of 3 seconds.
CAUTION!!! it is very overpowered. Do not use in small spaces and near anyplace you don't want to kill inocent npc's or set on fire anyone that you know will try to kill you. esp. Comander Caias of Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
This is a spell I created with the creation kit.  It is located in Whiterun as you walk in through the main gate to the left side on the wall near the light lamp.

Sorry I have no pic yet but I hopefully will be adding some soon.  Also I'm  planning on making morespells in the future like Alteration, Illusion, Conjuration.  Also I'm planning on making an additional perk tree that deals in rune usage.  I'm thinking of calling it "Rune Master" it deals in runes that will level up with the player and grow stronger with each perk invested i'd also like to make it accessable to vanilla Skyre and Perkus Maximus. I'd like to get permission from the mod authors to do this but making the tree and the spell tomes might take a while. I am still a kind of Novice at making spells so please try them out and tell me what you think.  I also have 2 Followers witch integrate awesomely with follower mods like AFT and EFF. 

Hope you all enjoy my first try at this mod making stuff.
author: Viper1475
